titleStmt.title: A true discourse of a cruell fact committed by a gentlewoman towardes her husband, her father, her sister and two of her nephewes First printed in French at Roan: and now translated into English.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by [J. Windet for] Iohn Wolfe, and are to bee sold at his shoppe within Popes head Alley in Lombard street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shoppe within Popes head Alley in Lombard street
